Posts.Title: Severe joint pain following chemo. Please help.

Posts.Content: Hi   Soon be long enough, once it starts it grows really quick. go get it cut  even when it's really short as new stuff is like baby hair. i was lucky my hairdresser had done research into 'chemo hair' so knew what to do. Good luck, i never want to see a scarf again!!!!!!!!!
Posts.Title: Severe joint pain following chemo. Please help.

Posts.Content: Your hair will grow back quickly, go to a good hairdresser & tell them you've had chemo & they will trim your hair to get rid of all the fluffy bits just like when you were a baby, trimming helps the growth. I personally never want to see the 100 or so scarves i collected ever again. good luck.   Magel
